Name: Speedway Challenge League
About the game: Speedway Challenge League is a 2D speedway game. Our goal is to create the most exciting game for all speedway fans - from the casual ones to the real supporters. Feel speedway emotions thanks to realistic riding physics. Play in league mode, challenges mode, friendly matches and individual tournaments. Are you ready for the challenge? Become a league champion or win classic challenges to gain SCP points for which you can unlock new tracks and teams. 3 game modes: - league mode - challenges mode - quick game mode: 2 teams friendly match, 4 teams friendly match, individual tournament Key features in league mode: - 6 main leagues - polish, british, swedish, danish, german and french - club budget - manage your finances to avoid debit and club relegation - injures - transfers - negotiate with other team riders and free agents - rider contracts - advanced rider stats - variable rider skills during season - compete in league mode for many years (no year limit) - exact league rules for every available league - real riders flow (transfers between clubs, new juniors, old riders retirements) - create own team Key game features: - realistic riding model - local multiplayer (up to 4 players at the same PC) - configurable camera view (zoom in, zoom out) - 94 teams (league, national and classic teams) - 739 riders (each with different riding level) - 49 tracks with different riding model - 3 difficulty levels
